items.title: Welcome to the Apteco Help Hub
items.text:
Unlock help, support, and resources, and get the most out of your Apteco software.

  • HTML for content and structure
  • JavaScript for interactivity
  • CSS for text running out of boxes
  • Internet Explorer ... huh?

Want to stay in the loop?

Join the Apteco Insider Programme to get early access to upcoming features and the opportunity to shape our product development.

items.title: Text formatting
items.text:
**bold text**
*italic text*
***bold and italic***
~~strikethrough~~
`inline code`

items.title: Links and images
items.text:
[Link text](https://example.com)
[Link with title](https://example.com "Hover title")
![Alt text](image.jpg)
![Image with title](image.jpg "Image title")

items.title: Lists
items.text:
Unordered:
- Item 1
- Item 2
  - Nested item

Ordered:
1. First item
2. Second item
3. Third item

items.title: Blockquotes
items.text:
> This is a blockquote
> Multiple lines
>> Nested quote

items.text:
```javascript
function hello() {
  console.log("Hello, world!");
}
```

items.text:

items.text:

or
***
or

items.title: Task lists
items.text:
- [x] Completed task
- [ ] Incomplete task
- [ ] Another task

items.title: Escaping characters
items.text: Use backslash to escape: \* \_ \# \`

items.title: Line breaks
items.text:
End a line with two spaces  
to create a line break.

Or use a blank line for a new paragraph.

items.title: Commands
items.text:
• zensical new - Create a new project
  • zensical serve - Start local web server
  • zensical build - Build your site

Go to documentation

Tip

This is a tip!

items.title: Details
items.text:
Go to documentation

Click to expand for more info

This content is hidden until you click to expand it. Great for FAQs or long explanations.

items.title: Code Blocks
items.text:
Go to documentation

Code blocks
def greet(name):
    print(f"Hello, {name}!") # (1)!

greet("Python")

  1. Go to documentation

    Code annotations allow to attach notes to lines of code.

Code can also be highlighted inline: print("Hello, Python!").

items.title: Content tabs
items.text:
Go to documentation

PythonRust 
print("Hello from Python!")

println!("Hello from Rust!");

graph LR

items.title: Maths
items.text:
Go to documentation

\[ \cos x=\sum_{k=0}^{\infty}\frac{(-1)^k}{(2k)!}x^{2k} \]

Needs configuration

Note that MathJax is included via a script tag on this page and is not configured in the generated default configuration to avoid including it in a pages that do not need it. See the documentation for details on how to configure it on all your pages if they are more Maths-heavy than these simple starter pages.

items.title: End-to-end marketing platform
items.text:
• Build your system

    Unify your data with the Apteco Customer Data Platform

    Connect

  • Analyse your data

    Transforms complex data into insights trhough interactive dashboards.

    Dashboards

  • Target your audience

    Reach the most relevant potential customers with powerful, precision targeting.

    Audiences

  • Create your campaign

    Build smarter journeys, automate intelligently, and prove every campaign’s impact.

    Campaigns

items.title: Connect
items.text:
Example use cases Pet and animal information for charitiesLoyalty programme physical characteristics

Store pet ownership data alongside donor profiles to personalise communications and segment audiences.

Record attributes such as pet type, pet name, and pet age under Individuals. When donors update their information through different channels like website, events, or phone, all sources automatically update the same attributes.

Capture physical characteristics from your loyalty programme data without creating complex table joins.

Use attributes to store information such as height, eye colour, and clothing size against individual records. This allows your retail team to access and segment customers by these characteristics directly in audience selection, making it easier to personalise product recommendations and targeted offers.
